full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 130 of 228 806 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct
1 Q. Other than the New Mexico property and the Palm Beach property, have you visited any other of Mr. Epstein's properties?
2 A. The island.
3 Q. About when did you visit the island?
4 A. The island I visit for maybe two hours.
5 Q. I'm sorry, about what year or approximately?
6 A. I can't remember.
7 Q. Was it during your employment with Mr. Epstein?
8 A. Yes, of course.
9 Q. For about how long were you on the island?
10 A. Oh, for two hours. We --
11 Q. Mr. Alessi, could you speak into the microphone, please.
12 A. We went to a vacation with my wife in a cruise line. And the cruise line was supposed -- it did stop in St. Thomas. And the people from the island pick us up and they show us the island. Very, very exclusive, beautiful island.
13 Q. Could you describe the island.
14 A. Yes. The island had -- the main structures of the island was not one house, but there were different pavilions, different parts of the house. And it had a -- I think it was in the center, it had the pool, and the kitchen/dining room area was the biggest structure that I saw when I went there. It was the kitchen/dining room area.
15 Q. What properties, if any, of Ms. Maxwell's did you visit
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012415
